Title: Lainey Loves Lionel
Writer: Adam F. Goldberg (created by), David Guarascio (teleplay), Josef Adalian (story), Lacey Marisa Friedman (story editor)
Actors: Wendi McLendon-Covey, Sean Giambrone, Troy Gentile, Hayley Orrantia
Plot: Valentines Day and Adam tries to break the rules while Barry wants to make a good impression on Lainey and Erica has an admirer.
